articles.author: Barry Schwartz
articles.title: Google Bard can now respond in real time - Search Engine Land
articles.description: There is a setting to turn this real-time response off.
articles.content: Google Bard, the conversational AI tool by Google, can now respond to your questions in real-time. You can turn it off and tell Bard to only respond once the answer is complete, but now, by default, … [+998 chars]
